name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then his flesh is refreshed like a child’s; he returns to the days of his youth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He prays to God and finds favor;","poem":1},{"text":"he sees God’s face and shouts for joy,","poem":2},{"text":"and God restores His righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"to that man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He prays to God and finds favor; he sees God’s face and shouts for joy, and God restores His righteousness to that man.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then he sings before","poem":1},{"noteId":54},{"text":"men","poem":1},{"text":"with these words:","poem":2},{"text":"‘I have sinned and perverted what was right;","poem":1},{"text":"yet I did not get what I deserved.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then he sings before men with these words: ‘I have sinned and perverted what was right; yet I did not get what I deserved.

contentJson: [{"text":"He redeemed my soul from going down to the Pit,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will live to see the light.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He redeemed my soul from going down to the Pit, and I will live to see the light.’

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, all these things God does to a man,","poem":1},{"text":"two or even three times,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, all these things God does to a man, two or even three times,

contentJson: [{"text":"to bring back his soul from the Pit,","poem":1},{"text":"that he may be enlightened with the light of life.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to bring back his soul from the Pit, that he may be enlightened with the light of life.

contentJson: [{"text":"Pay attention, Job, and listen to me;","poem":1},{"text":"be silent, and I will speak.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Pay attention, Job, and listen to me; be silent, and I will speak.

contentJson: [{"text":"But if you have something to say, answer me;","poem":1},{"text":"speak up, for I would like to vindicate you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But if you have something to say, answer me; speak up, for I would like to vindicate you.

contentJson: [{"text":"But if not, then listen to me;","poem":1},{"text":"be quiet, and I will teach you wisdom.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But if not, then listen to me; be quiet, and I will teach you wisdom.”

contentJson: ["Then Elihu continued:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Elihu continued:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Hear my words, O wise men;","poem":1},{"text":"give ear to me, O men of learning.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Hear my words, O wise men; give ear to me, O men of learning.

contentJson: [{"text":"For the ear tests words","poem":1},{"text":"as the mouth tastes food.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For the ear tests words as the mouth tastes food.

contentJson: [{"text":"Let us choose for ourselves what is right;","poem":1},{"text":"let us learn together what is good.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Let us choose for ourselves what is right; let us learn together what is good.

contentJson: [{"text":"For Job has declared, ‘I am righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"yet God has deprived me of justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For Job has declared, ‘I am righteous, yet God has deprived me of justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Would I lie about my case?","poem":1},{"text":"My wound is incurable,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"though I am without transgression.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Would I lie about my case? My wound is incurable, 
though I am without transgression.’

contentJson: [{"text":"What man is like Job,","poem":1},{"text":"who drinks up derision like water?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: What man is like Job, who drinks up derision like water?

contentJson: [{"text":"He keeps company with evildoers","poem":1},{"text":"and walks with wicked men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He keeps company with evildoers and walks with wicked men.

contentJson: [{"text":"For he has said, ‘It profits a man nothing","poem":1},{"text":"that he should delight in God.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For he has said, ‘It profits a man nothing that he should delight in God.’

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore listen to me,","poem":1},{"text":"O men of understanding.","poem":2},{"text":"Far be it from God to do wrong,","poem":1},{"text":"and from the Almighty to act unjustly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore listen to me, O men of understanding. Far be it from God to do wrong, and from the Almighty to act unjustly.

contentJson: [{"text":"For according to a man’s deeds He repays him;","poem":1},{"text":"according to a man’s ways He brings consequences.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For according to a man’s deeds He repays him; according to a man’s ways He brings consequences.

contentJson: [{"text":"Indeed, it is true that God does not act wickedly,","poem":1},{"text":"and the Almighty does not pervert justice.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Indeed, it is true that God does not act wickedly, and the Almighty does not pervert justice.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who gave Him charge over the earth?","poem":1},{"text":"Who appointed Him over the whole world?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who gave Him charge over the earth? Who appointed Him over the whole world?

contentJson: [{"text":"If He were to set His heart to it","poem":1},{"text":"and withdraw His Spirit and breath,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If He were to set His heart to it and withdraw His Spirit and breath,

contentJson: [{"text":"all flesh would perish together","poem":1},{"text":"and mankind would return to the dust.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: all flesh would perish together and mankind would return to the dust.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you have understanding, hear this;","poem":1},{"text":"listen to my words.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you have understanding, hear this; listen to my words.

contentJson: [{"text":"Could one who hates justice govern?","poem":1},{"text":"Will you condemn the just and mighty One,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Could one who hates justice govern? Will you condemn the just and mighty One,

contentJson: [{"text":"who says to kings, ‘You are worthless!’","poem":1},{"text":"and to nobles, ‘You are wicked,’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who says to kings, ‘You are worthless!’ and to nobles, ‘You are wicked,’

contentJson: [{"text":"who is not partial to princes","poem":1},{"text":"and does not favor rich over poor?","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"For they are all the work of His hands.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
who is not partial to princes and does not favor rich over poor? 
For they are all the work of His hands.

contentJson: [{"text":"They die in an instant,","poem":1},{"text":"in the middle of the night.","poem":2},{"text":"The people convulse and pass away;","poem":1},{"text":"the mighty are removed without human hand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They die in an instant, in the middle of the night. The people convulse and pass away; the mighty are removed without human hand.

contentJson: [{"text":"For His eyes are on the ways of a man,","poem":1},{"text":"and He sees his every step.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For His eyes are on the ways of a man, and He sees his every step.

contentJson: [{"text":"There is no darkness or deep shadow","poem":1},{"text":"where the workers of iniquity can hide.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There is no darkness or deep shadow where the workers of iniquity can hide.

contentJson: [{"text":"For God need not examine a man further","poem":1},{"text":"or have him approach for judgment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For God need not examine a man further or have him approach for judgment.

contentJson: [{"text":"He shatters the mighty without inquiry","poem":1},{"text":"and sets up others in their place.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He shatters the mighty without inquiry and sets up others in their place.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore, He recognizes their deeds;","poem":1},{"text":"He overthrows them in the night and they are crushed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore, He recognizes their deeds; He overthrows them in the night and they are crushed.

contentJson: [{"text":"He strikes them for their wickedness","poem":1},{"text":"in full view,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He strikes them for their wickedness in full view,

contentJson: [{"text":"because they turned aside from Him","poem":1},{"text":"and had no regard for any of His ways.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because they turned aside from Him and had no regard for any of His ways.

contentJson: [{"text":"They caused the cry of the poor to come before Him,","poem":1},{"text":"and He heard the outcry of the afflicted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They caused the cry of the poor to come before Him, and He heard the outcry of the afflicted.

contentJson: [{"text":"But when He remains silent, who can condemn Him?","poem":1},{"text":"When He hides His face, who can see Him?","poem":2},{"text":"Yet He watches over both man and nation,","poem":1}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But when He remains silent, who can condemn Him? When He hides His face, who can see Him? Yet He watches over both man and nation,

contentJson: [{"text":"that godless men should not rule","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"or lay snares for the people.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
that godless men should not rule 
or lay snares for the people.

contentJson: [{"text":"Suppose someone says to God,","poem":1},{"text":"‘I have endured my punishment; I will offend no more.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Suppose someone says to God, ‘I have endured my punishment; I will offend no more.

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach me what I cannot see;","poem":1},{"text":"if I have done wrong, I will not do it again.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach me what I cannot see; if I have done wrong, I will not do it again.’

contentJson: [{"text":"Should God repay you on your own terms","poem":1},{"text":"when you have disavowed His?","poem":2},{"text":"You must choose, not I;","poem":1},{"text":"so tell me what you know.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Should God repay you on your own terms when you have disavowed His? You must choose, not I; so tell me what you know.

contentJson: [{"text":"Men of understanding will declare to me,","poem":1},{"text":"and the wise men who hear me will say:","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Men of understanding will declare to me, and the wise men who hear me will say:

contentJson: [{"text":"‘Job speaks without knowledge;","poem":1},{"text":"his words lack insight.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: ‘Job speaks without knowledge; his words lack insight.’

contentJson: [{"text":"If only Job were tried to the utmost","poem":1},{"text":"for answering like a wicked man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If only Job were tried to the utmost for answering like a wicked man.

contentJson: [{"text":"For he adds rebellion to his sin;","poem":1},{"text":"he claps his hands among us","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and multiplies his words against God.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
For he adds rebellion to his sin; he claps his hands among us 
and multiplies his words against God.”

contentJson: ["And Elihu went on to say:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And Elihu went on to say:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Do you think this is just?","poem":1},{"text":"You say, ‘I am more righteous than God.’","poem":2},{"noteId":55}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Do you think this is just? You say, ‘I am more righteous than God.’

contentJson: [{"text":"For you ask, ‘What does it profit me,","poem":1},{"text":"and what benefit do I gain apart from sin?’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For you ask, ‘What does it profit me, and what benefit do I gain apart from sin?’

contentJson: [{"text":"I will reply to you","poem":1},{"text":"and to your friends as well.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I will reply to you and to your friends as well.

contentJson: [{"text":"Look to the heavens and see;","poem":1},{"text":"gaze at the clouds high above you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look to the heavens and see; gaze at the clouds high above you.

contentJson: [{"text":"If you sin, what do you accomplish against Him?","poem":1},{"text":"If you multiply your transgressions, what do you do to Him?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you sin, what do you accomplish against Him? If you multiply your transgressions, what do you do to Him?

contentJson: [{"text":"If you are righteous, what do you give Him,","poem":1},{"text":"or what does He receive from your hand?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you are righteous, what do you give Him, or what does He receive from your hand?

contentJson: [{"text":"Your wickedness affects only a man like yourself,","poem":1},{"text":"and your righteousness only a son of man.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Your wickedness affects only a man like yourself, and your righteousness only a son of man.

contentJson: [{"text":"Men cry out under great oppression;","poem":1},{"text":"they plead for relief from the arm of the mighty.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Men cry out under great oppression; they plead for relief from the arm of the mighty.

contentJson: [{"text":"But no one asks, ‘Where is God my Maker,","poem":1},{"text":"who gives us songs in the night,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But no one asks, ‘Where is God my Maker, who gives us songs in the night,

contentJson: [{"text":"who teaches us more than the beasts of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"and makes us wiser than the birds of the air?’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: who teaches us more than the beasts of the earth and makes us wiser than the birds of the air?’

contentJson: [{"text":"There they cry out, but He does not answer,","poem":1},{"text":"because of the pride of evil men.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: There they cry out, but He does not answer, because of the pride of evil men.

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely God does not listen to empty pleas,","poem":1},{"text":"and the Almighty does not take note of it.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely God does not listen to empty pleas, and the Almighty does not take note of it.

contentJson: [{"text":"How much less, then, when you say that you do not see Him,","poem":1},{"text":"that your case is before Him and you must wait for Him,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: How much less, then, when you say that you do not see Him, that your case is before Him and you must wait for Him,

contentJson: [{"text":"and further, that in His anger He has not punished","poem":1},{"text":"or taken much notice of folly!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and further, that in His anger He has not punished or taken much notice of folly!

contentJson: [{"text":"So Job opens his mouth in vain","poem":1},{"text":"and multiplies words without knowledge.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So Job opens his mouth in vain and multiplies words without knowledge.”

contentJson: ["And Elihu continued:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And Elihu continued:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Bear with me a little longer, and I will show you","poem":1},{"text":"that there is more to be said on God’s behalf.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Bear with me a little longer, and I will show you that there is more to be said on God’s behalf.

contentJson: [{"text":"I get my knowledge from afar,","poem":1},{"text":"and I will ascribe justice to my Maker.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I get my knowledge from afar, and I will ascribe justice to my Maker.

contentJson: [{"text":"For truly my words are free of falsehood;","poem":1},{"text":"one perfect in knowledge is with you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For truly my words are free of falsehood; one perfect in knowledge is with you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Indeed, God is mighty, but He despises no one;","poem":1},{"text":"He is mighty in strength of understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Indeed, God is mighty, but He despises no one; He is mighty in strength of understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"He does not keep the wicked alive,","poem":1},{"text":"but He grants justice to the afflicted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He does not keep the wicked alive, but He grants justice to the afflicted.

contentJson: [{"text":"He does not take His eyes off the righteous,","poem":1},{"text":"but He enthrones them with kings","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and exalts them forever.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
He does not take His eyes off the righteous, but He enthrones them with kings 
and exalts them forever.

contentJson: [{"text":"And if men are bound with chains,","poem":1},{"text":"caught in cords of affliction,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And if men are bound with chains, caught in cords of affliction,

contentJson: [{"text":"then He tells them their deeds","poem":1},{"text":"and how arrogantly they have transgressed.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: then He tells them their deeds and how arrogantly they have transgressed.

contentJson: [{"text":"He opens their ears to correction","poem":1},{"text":"and commands that they turn from iniquity.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He opens their ears to correction and commands that they turn from iniquity.

contentJson: [{"text":"If they obey and serve Him,","poem":1},{"text":"then they end their days in prosperity","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and their years in happiness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
If they obey and serve Him, then they end their days in prosperity 
and their years in happiness.

contentJson: [{"text":"But if they do not obey,","poem":1},{"text":"then they perish by the sword","poem":2},{"noteId":56},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"and die without knowledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
But if they do not obey, then they perish by the sword 
and die without knowledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"The godless in heart harbor resentment;","poem":1},{"text":"even when He binds them, they do not cry for help.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The godless in heart harbor resentment; even when He binds them, they do not cry for help.

contentJson: [{"text":"They die in their youth,","poem":1},{"text":"among the male shrine prostitutes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They die in their youth, among the male shrine prostitutes.

contentJson: [{"text":"God rescues the afflicted by their affliction","poem":1},{"noteId":57},{"text":"and opens their ears in oppression.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God rescues the afflicted by their affliction and opens their ears in oppression.

contentJson: [{"text":"Indeed, He drew you from the jaws of distress","poem":1},{"text":"to a spacious and broad place,","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"to a table full of richness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Indeed, He drew you from the jaws of distress to a spacious and broad place, 
to a table full of richness.

contentJson: [{"text":"But now you are laden with the judgment due the wicked;","poem":1},{"text":"judgment and justice have seized you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: But now you are laden with the judgment due the wicked; judgment and justice have seized you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be careful that no one lures you with riches;","poem":1},{"text":"do not let a large bribe lead you astray.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be careful that no one lures you with riches; do not let a large bribe lead you astray.

contentJson: [{"text":"Can your wealth","poem":1},{"noteId":58},{"text":"or all your mighty effort","poem":1},{"text":"keep you from distress?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can your wealth or all your mighty effort keep you from distress?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do not long for the night,","poem":1},{"text":"when people vanish from their homes.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do not long for the night, when people vanish from their homes.

contentJson: [{"text":"Be careful not to turn to iniquity,","poem":1},{"text":"for this you have preferred to affliction.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Be careful not to turn to iniquity, for this you have preferred to affliction.

contentJson: [{"text":"Behold, God is exalted in His power.","poem":1},{"text":"Who is a teacher like Him?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Behold, God is exalted in His power. Who is a teacher like Him?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has appointed His way for Him,","poem":1},{"text":"or told Him, ‘You have done wrong’?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who has appointed His way for Him, or told Him, ‘You have done wrong’?

contentJson: [{"text":"Remember to magnify His work,","poem":1},{"text":"which men have praised in song.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Remember to magnify His work, which men have praised in song.

contentJson: [{"text":"All mankind has seen it;","poem":1},{"text":"men behold it from afar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All mankind has seen it; men behold it from afar.

contentJson: [{"text":"Indeed, God is great—beyond our knowledge;","poem":1},{"text":"the number of His years is unsearchable.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Indeed, God is great—beyond our knowledge; the number of His years is unsearchable.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He draws up drops of water","poem":1},{"text":"which distill the rain from the mist,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He draws up drops of water which distill the rain from the mist,

contentJson: [{"text":"which the clouds pour out","poem":1},{"text":"and shower abundantly on mankind.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: which the clouds pour out and shower abundantly on mankind.

contentJson: [{"text":"Furthermore, who can understand how the clouds spread out,","poem":1},{"text":"how the thunder roars from His pavilion?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Furthermore, who can understand how the clouds spread out, how the thunder roars from His pavilion?

contentJson: [{"text":"See how He scatters His lightning around Him","poem":1},{"text":"and covers the depths of the sea.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: See how He scatters His lightning around Him and covers the depths of the sea.

contentJson: [{"text":"For by these He judges","poem":1},{"noteId":59},{"text":"the nations","poem":1},{"text":"and provides food in abundance.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For by these He judges the nations and provides food in abundance.

contentJson: [{"text":"He fills His hands with lightning","poem":1},{"text":"and commands it to strike its mark.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He fills His hands with lightning and commands it to strike its mark.

contentJson: [{"text":"The thunder declares His presence;","poem":1},{"text":"even the cattle regard the rising storm.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The thunder declares His presence; even the cattle regard the rising storm.

contentJson: [{"text":"“At this my heart also pounds","poem":1},{"text":"and leaps from its place.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “At this my heart also pounds and leaps from its place.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen closely to the thunder of His voice","poem":1},{"text":"and the rumbling that comes from His mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen closely to the thunder of His voice and the rumbling that comes from His mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"He unleashes His lightning beneath the whole sky","poem":1},{"text":"and sends it to the ends of the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He unleashes His lightning beneath the whole sky and sends it to the ends of the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then there comes a roaring sound;","poem":1},{"text":"He thunders with His majestic voice.","poem":2},{"text":"He does not restrain the lightning","poem":1},{"text":"when His voice resounds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then there comes a roaring sound; He thunders with His majestic voice. He does not restrain the lightning when His voice resounds.

contentJson: [{"text":"God thunders wondrously with His voice;","poem":1},{"text":"He does great things we cannot comprehend.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: God thunders wondrously with His voice; He does great things we cannot comprehend.

contentJson: [{"text":"For He says to the snow, ‘Fall on the earth,’","poem":1},{"text":"and to the gentle rain, ‘Pour out a mighty downpour.’","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For He says to the snow, ‘Fall on the earth,’ and to the gentle rain, ‘Pour out a mighty downpour.’

contentJson: [{"text":"He seals up the hand of every man,","poem":1},{"text":"so that all men may know His work.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He seals up the hand of every man, so that all men may know His work.

contentJson: [{"text":"The wild animals enter their lairs;","poem":1},{"text":"they settle down in their dens.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wild animals enter their lairs; they settle down in their dens.

contentJson: [{"text":"The tempest comes from its chamber,","poem":1},{"text":"and the cold from the driving north winds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The tempest comes from its chamber, and the cold from the driving north winds.

contentJson: [{"text":"By the breath of God the ice is formed","poem":1},{"text":"and the watery expanses are frozen.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: By the breath of God the ice is formed and the watery expanses are frozen.

contentJson: [{"text":"He loads the clouds with moisture;","poem":1},{"text":"He scatters His lightning through them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He loads the clouds with moisture; He scatters His lightning through them.

contentJson: [{"text":"They swirl about,","poem":1},{"text":"whirling at His direction,","poem":2},{"text":"accomplishing all that He commands","poem":1},{"text":"over the face of all the earth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They swirl about, whirling at His direction, accomplishing all that He commands over the face of all the earth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Whether for punishment or for His land,","poem":1},{"text":"He accomplishes this in His loving devotion.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whether for punishment or for His land, He accomplishes this in His loving devotion.

contentJson: [{"text":"Listen to this, O Job;","poem":1},{"text":"stand still and consider the wonders of God.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Listen to this, O Job; stand still and consider the wonders of God.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you know how God dispatches the clouds","poem":1},{"text":"or makes the lightning flash?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you know how God dispatches the clouds or makes the lightning flash?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you understand how the clouds float,","poem":1},{"text":"those wonders of Him who is perfect in knowledge?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you understand how the clouds float, those wonders of Him who is perfect in knowledge?

contentJson: [{"text":"You whose clothes get hot","poem":1},{"text":"when the land lies hushed under the south wind,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You whose clothes get hot when the land lies hushed under the south wind,

contentJson: [{"text":"can you, like Him, spread out the skies","poem":1},{"text":"to reflect the heat like a mirror of bronze?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: can you, like Him, spread out the skies to reflect the heat like a mirror of bronze?

contentJson: [{"text":"Teach us what we should say to Him;","poem":1},{"text":"we cannot draw up our case when our faces are in darkness.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Teach us what we should say to Him; we cannot draw up our case when our faces are in darkness.

contentJson: [{"text":"Should He be told that I want to speak?","poem":1},{"text":"Would a man ask to be swallowed up","poem":2},{"noteId":60},{"text":"?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Should He be told that I want to speak? Would a man ask to be swallowed up ?

contentJson: [{"text":"Now no one can gaze at the sun","poem":1},{"text":"when it is bright in the skies","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"after the wind has swept them clean.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Now no one can gaze at the sun when it is bright in the skies 
after the wind has swept them clean.

contentJson: [{"text":"Out of the north He comes in golden splendor;","poem":1},{"text":"awesome majesty surrounds Him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Out of the north He comes in golden splendor; awesome majesty surrounds Him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The Almighty is beyond our reach;","poem":1},{"text":"He is exalted in power!","poem":2},{"text":"In His justice and great righteousness","poem":1},{"text":"He does not oppress.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The Almighty is beyond our reach; He is exalted in power! In His justice and great righteousness He does not oppress.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore, men fear Him,","poem":1},{"text":"for He is not partial to the wise in heart.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore, men fear Him, for He is not partial to the wise in heart.”

contentJson: ["Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind and said:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind and said:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Who is this who obscures My counsel","poem":1},{"text":"by words without knowledge?","poem":2},{"noteId":61}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Who is this who obscures My counsel by words without knowledge?

contentJson: [{"text":"Now brace yourself","poem":1},{"noteId":62},{"text":"like a man;","poem":1},{"text":"I will question you, and you shall inform Me.","poem":2},{"noteId":63}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Now brace yourself like a man; I will question you, and you shall inform Me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Where were you when I laid the foundations of the earth?","poem":1},{"text":"Tell Me, if you have understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Where were you when I laid the foundations of the earth? Tell Me, if you have understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who fixed its measurements? Surely you know!","poem":1},{"text":"Or who stretched a measuring line across it?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who fixed its measurements? Surely you know! Or who stretched a measuring line across it?

contentJson: [{"text":"On what were its foundations set,","poem":1},{"text":"or who laid its cornerstone,","poem":2},{"noteId":64}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: On what were its foundations set, or who laid its cornerstone,

contentJson: [{"text":"while the morning stars sang together","poem":1},{"text":"and all the sons of God shouted for joy?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: while the morning stars sang together and all the sons of God shouted for joy?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who enclosed the sea behind doors","poem":1},{"text":"when it burst forth from the womb,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who enclosed the sea behind doors when it burst forth from the womb,

contentJson: [{"text":"when I made the clouds its garment","poem":1},{"text":"and thick darkness its blanket,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when I made the clouds its garment and thick darkness its blanket,

contentJson: [{"text":"when I fixed its boundaries","poem":1},{"text":"and set in place its bars and doors,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when I fixed its boundaries and set in place its bars and doors,

contentJson: [{"text":"and I declared: ‘You may come this far, but no farther;","poem":1},{"text":"here your proud waves must stop’?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: and I declared: ‘You may come this far, but no farther; here your proud waves must stop’?

contentJson: [{"text":"In your days, have you commanded the morning","poem":1},{"text":"or assigned the dawn its place,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In your days, have you commanded the morning or assigned the dawn its place,

contentJson: [{"text":"that it might spread to the ends of the earth","poem":1},{"text":"and shake the wicked out of it?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: that it might spread to the ends of the earth and shake the wicked out of it?

contentJson: [{"text":"The earth takes shape like clay under a seal;","poem":1},{"text":"its hills stand out like the folds of a garment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The earth takes shape like clay under a seal; its hills stand out like the folds of a garment.

contentJson: [{"text":"Light is withheld from the wicked,","poem":1},{"text":"and their upraised arm is broken.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Light is withheld from the wicked, and their upraised arm is broken.

contentJson: [{"text":"Have you journeyed to the vents of the sea","poem":1},{"text":"or walked in the trenches of the deep?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have you journeyed to the vents of the sea or walked in the trenches of the deep?

contentJson: [{"text":"Have the gates of death been revealed to you?","poem":1},{"text":"Have you seen the gates of the shadow of death?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have the gates of death been revealed to you? Have you seen the gates of the shadow of death?

contentJson: [{"text":"Have you surveyed the extent of the earth?","poem":1},{"text":"Tell Me, if you know all this.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have you surveyed the extent of the earth? Tell Me, if you know all this.

contentJson: [{"text":"Where is the way to the home of light?","poem":1},{"text":"Do you know where darkness resides,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Where is the way to the home of light? Do you know where darkness resides,

contentJson: [{"text":"so you can lead it back to its border?","poem":1},{"text":"Do you know the paths to its home?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: so you can lead it back to its border? Do you know the paths to its home?

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely you know, for you were already born!","poem":1},{"text":"And the number of your days is great!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely you know, for you were already born! And the number of your days is great!

contentJson: [{"text":"Have you entered the storehouses of snow","poem":1},{"text":"or observed the storehouses of hail,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Have you entered the storehouses of snow or observed the storehouses of hail,

contentJson: [{"text":"which I hold in reserve for times of trouble,","poem":1},{"text":"for the day of war and battle?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: which I hold in reserve for times of trouble, for the day of war and battle?

contentJson: [{"text":"In which direction is the lightning dispersed,","poem":1},{"text":"or the east wind scattered over the earth?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: In which direction is the lightning dispersed, or the east wind scattered over the earth?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who cuts a channel for the flood","poem":1},{"text":"or clears a path for the thunderbolt,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who cuts a channel for the flood or clears a path for the thunderbolt,

contentJson: [{"text":"to bring rain on a barren land,","poem":1},{"text":"on a desert where no man lives,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to bring rain on a barren land, on a desert where no man lives,

contentJson: [{"text":"to satisfy the parched wasteland","poem":1},{"text":"and make it sprout with tender grass?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: to satisfy the parched wasteland and make it sprout with tender grass?

contentJson: [{"text":"Does the rain have a father?","poem":1},{"text":"Who has begotten the drops of dew?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Does the rain have a father? Who has begotten the drops of dew?

contentJson: [{"text":"From whose womb does the ice emerge?","poem":1},{"text":"Who gives birth to the frost from heaven,","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From whose womb does the ice emerge? Who gives birth to the frost from heaven,

contentJson: [{"text":"when the waters become hard as stone","poem":1},{"text":"and the surface of the deep is frozen?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when the waters become hard as stone and the surface of the deep is frozen?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you bind the chains of the Pleiades","poem":1},{"text":"or loosen the belt of Orion?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you bind the chains of the Pleiades or loosen the belt of Orion?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you bring forth the constellations in their seasons","poem":1},{"noteId":65},{"text":"or lead out the Bear","poem":2},{"noteId":66},{"text":"and her cubs?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you bring forth the constellations in their seasons or lead out the Bear and her cubs?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you know the laws of the heavens?","poem":1},{"text":"Can you set their dominion over the earth?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you know the laws of the heavens? Can you set their dominion over the earth?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you command the clouds","poem":1},{"text":"so that a flood of water covers you?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you command the clouds so that a flood of water covers you?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you send the lightning bolts on their way?","poem":1},{"text":"Do they report to you, ‘Here we are’?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you send the lightning bolts on their way? Do they report to you, ‘Here we are’?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has put wisdom in the heart","poem":1},{"noteId":67},{"text":"or given understanding to the mind?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who has put wisdom in the heart or given understanding to the mind?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has the wisdom to count the clouds?","poem":1},{"text":"Or who can tilt the water jars of the heavens","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who has the wisdom to count the clouds? Or who can tilt the water jars of the heavens

contentJson: [{"text":"when the dust hardens into a mass","poem":1},{"text":"and the clods of earth stick together?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when the dust hardens into a mass and the clods of earth stick together?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you hunt the prey for a lioness","poem":1},{"text":"or satisfy the hunger of young lions","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you hunt the prey for a lioness or satisfy the hunger of young lions

contentJson: [{"text":"when they crouch in their dens","poem":1},{"text":"and lie in wait in the thicket?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: when they crouch in their dens and lie in wait in the thicket?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who provides food for the raven","poem":1},{"text":"when its young cry out to God","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"as they wander about for lack of food?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
Who provides food for the raven when its young cry out to God 
as they wander about for lack of food?

contentJson: [{"text":"“Do you know when mountain goats give birth?","poem":1},{"text":"Have you watched the doe bear her fawn?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Do you know when mountain goats give birth? Have you watched the doe bear her fawn?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you count the months they are pregnant?","poem":1},{"text":"Do you know the time they give birth?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you count the months they are pregnant? Do you know the time they give birth?

contentJson: [{"text":"They crouch down and bring forth their young;","poem":1},{"text":"they deliver their newborn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They crouch down and bring forth their young; they deliver their newborn.

contentJson: [{"text":"Their young ones thrive and grow up in the open field;","poem":1},{"text":"they leave and do not return.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Their young ones thrive and grow up in the open field; they leave and do not return.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who set the wild donkey free?","poem":1},{"text":"Who released the swift donkey from the harness?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who set the wild donkey free? Who released the swift donkey from the harness?

contentJson: [{"text":"I made the wilderness his home","poem":1},{"text":"and the salt flats his dwelling.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I made the wilderness his home and the salt flats his dwelling.

contentJson: [{"text":"He scorns the tumult of the city","poem":1},{"text":"and never hears the shouts of a driver.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He scorns the tumult of the city and never hears the shouts of a driver.

contentJson: [{"text":"He roams the mountains for pasture,","poem":1},{"text":"searching for any green thing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He roams the mountains for pasture, searching for any green thing.

contentJson: [{"text":"Will the wild ox consent to serve you?","poem":1},{"text":"Will he stay by your manger at night?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will the wild ox consent to serve you? Will he stay by your manger at night?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you hold him to the furrow with a harness?","poem":1},{"text":"Will he plow the valleys behind you?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you hold him to the furrow with a harness? Will he plow the valleys behind you?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you rely on his great strength?","poem":1},{"text":"Will you leave your hard work to him?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you rely on his great strength? Will you leave your hard work to him?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you trust him to bring in your grain","poem":1},{"text":"and gather it to your threshing floor?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you trust him to bring in your grain and gather it to your threshing floor?

contentJson: [{"text":"The wings of the ostrich flap joyfully,","poem":1},{"text":"but cannot match the pinions","poem":2},{"noteId":68},{"text":"and feathers of the stork.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The wings of the ostrich flap joyfully, but cannot match the pinions and feathers of the stork.

contentJson: [{"text":"For she leaves her eggs on the ground","poem":1},{"text":"and lets them warm in the sand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For she leaves her eggs on the ground and lets them warm in the sand.

contentJson: [{"text":"She forgets that a foot may crush them,","poem":1},{"text":"or a wild animal may trample them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She forgets that a foot may crush them, or a wild animal may trample them.

contentJson: [{"text":"She treats her young harshly, as if not her own,","poem":1},{"text":"with no concern that her labor was in vain.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: She treats her young harshly, as if not her own, with no concern that her labor was in vain.

contentJson: [{"text":"For God has deprived her of wisdom;","poem":1},{"text":"He has not endowed her with understanding.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For God has deprived her of wisdom; He has not endowed her with understanding.

contentJson: [{"text":"Yet when she proudly spreads her wings,","poem":1},{"text":"she laughs at the horse and its rider.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Yet when she proudly spreads her wings, she laughs at the horse and its rider.

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you give strength to the horse","poem":1},{"text":"or adorn his neck with a mane?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you give strength to the horse or adorn his neck with a mane?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you make him leap like a locust,","poem":1},{"text":"striking terror with his proud snorting?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you make him leap like a locust, striking terror with his proud snorting?

contentJson: [{"text":"He paws in the valley and rejoices in his strength;","poem":1},{"text":"he charges into battle.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He paws in the valley and rejoices in his strength; he charges into battle.

contentJson: [{"text":"He laughs at fear, frightened of nothing;","poem":1},{"text":"he does not turn back from the sword.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He laughs at fear, frightened of nothing; he does not turn back from the sword.

contentJson: [{"text":"A quiver rattles at his side,","poem":1},{"text":"along with a flashing spear and lance.","poem":2},{"noteId":69}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A quiver rattles at his side, along with a flashing spear and lance.

contentJson: [{"text":"Trembling with excitement, he devours the distance;","poem":1},{"text":"he cannot stand still when the ram’s horn sounds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Trembling with excitement, he devours the distance; he cannot stand still when the ram’s horn sounds.

contentJson: [{"text":"At the blast of the horn, he snorts with fervor.","poem":1},{"noteId":70},{"text":"He catches the scent of battle from afar—","poem":2},{"lineBreak":true},{"text":"the shouts of captains and the cry of war.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
At the blast of the horn, he snorts with fervor. He catches the scent of battle from afar— 
the shouts of captains and the cry of war.

contentJson: [{"text":"Does the hawk take flight by your understanding","poem":1},{"text":"and spread his wings toward the south?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Does the hawk take flight by your understanding and spread his wings toward the south?

contentJson: [{"text":"Does the eagle soar at your command","poem":1},{"text":"and make his nest on high?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Does the eagle soar at your command and make his nest on high?

contentJson: [{"text":"He dwells on a cliff and lodges there;","poem":1},{"text":"his stronghold is on a rocky crag.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He dwells on a cliff and lodges there; his stronghold is on a rocky crag.

contentJson: [{"text":"From there he spies out food;","poem":1},{"text":"his eyes see it from afar.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: From there he spies out food; his eyes see it from afar.

contentJson: [{"text":"His young ones feast on blood;","poem":1},{"text":"and where the slain are, there he is.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His young ones feast on blood; and where the slain are, there he is.”

contentJson: ["And the LORD said to Job:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And the LORD said to Job:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Will the faultfinder contend with the Almighty?","poem":1},{"text":"Let him who argues with God give an answer.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Will the faultfinder contend with the Almighty? Let him who argues with God give an answer.”

contentJson: ["Then Job answered the LORD:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Job answered the LORD:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Behold, I am insignificant. How can I reply to You?","poem":1},{"text":"I place my hand over my mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Behold, I am insignificant. How can I reply to You? I place my hand over my mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"I have spoken once, but I have no answer—","poem":1},{"text":"twice, but I have nothing to add.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have spoken once, but I have no answer— twice, but I have nothing to add.”

contentJson: ["Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind and said:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then the LORD answered Job out of the whirlwind and said:

contentJson: [{"text":"“Now brace yourself","poem":1},{"noteId":71},{"text":"like a man;","poem":1},{"text":"I will question you, and you shall inform Me.","poem":2},{"noteId":72}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Now brace yourself like a man; I will question you, and you shall inform Me.

contentJson: [{"text":"Would you really annul My justice?","poem":1},{"text":"Would you condemn Me to justify yourself?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Would you really annul My justice? Would you condemn Me to justify yourself?

contentJson: [{"text":"Do you have an arm like God’s?","poem":1},{"text":"Can you thunder with a voice like His?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Do you have an arm like God’s? Can you thunder with a voice like His?

contentJson: [{"text":"Then adorn yourself with majesty and splendor,","poem":1},{"text":"and clothe yourself with honor and glory.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then adorn yourself with majesty and splendor, and clothe yourself with honor and glory.

contentJson: [{"text":"Unleash the fury of your wrath;","poem":1},{"text":"look on every proud man and bring him low.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Unleash the fury of your wrath; look on every proud man and bring him low.

contentJson: [{"text":"Look on every proud man and humble him;","poem":1},{"text":"trample the wicked where they stand.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look on every proud man and humble him; trample the wicked where they stand.

contentJson: [{"text":"Bury them together in the dust;","poem":1},{"text":"imprison them in the grave.","poem":2},{"noteId":73}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Bury them together in the dust; imprison them in the grave.

contentJson: [{"text":"Then I will confess to you","poem":1},{"text":"that your own right hand can save you.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then I will confess to you that your own right hand can save you.

contentJson: [{"text":"Look at Behemoth, which I made along with you.","poem":1},{"text":"He feeds on grass like an ox.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Look at Behemoth, which I made along with you. He feeds on grass like an ox.

contentJson: [{"text":"See the strength of his loins","poem":1},{"text":"and the power in the muscles of his belly.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: See the strength of his loins and the power in the muscles of his belly.

contentJson: [{"text":"His tail sways like a cedar;","poem":1},{"text":"the sinews of his thighs are tightly knit.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His tail sways like a cedar; the sinews of his thighs are tightly knit.

contentJson: [{"text":"His bones are tubes of bronze;","poem":1},{"text":"his limbs are rods of iron.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His bones are tubes of bronze; his limbs are rods of iron.

contentJson: [{"text":"He is the foremost of God’s works;","poem":1},{"noteId":74},{"text":"only his Maker can draw the sword against him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He is the foremost of God’s works; only his Maker can draw the sword against him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The hills yield him their produce,","poem":1},{"text":"while all the beasts of the field play nearby.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The hills yield him their produce, while all the beasts of the field play nearby.

contentJson: [{"text":"He lies under the lotus plants,","poem":1},{"noteId":75},{"text":"hidden among the reeds of the marsh.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He lies under the lotus plants, hidden among the reeds of the marsh.

contentJson: [{"text":"The lotus plants conceal him in their shade;","poem":1},{"text":"the willows","poem":2},{"noteId":76},{"text":"of the brook surround him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The lotus plants conceal him in their shade; the willows of the brook surround him.

contentJson: [{"text":"Though the river rages, Behemoth is unafraid;","poem":1},{"text":"he remains secure, though the Jordan surges to his mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Though the river rages, Behemoth is unafraid; he remains secure, though the Jordan surges to his mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Can anyone capture him as he looks on,","poem":1},{"text":"or pierce his nose with a snare?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can anyone capture him as he looks on, or pierce his nose with a snare?

contentJson: [{"text":"“Can you pull in Leviathan with a hook","poem":1},{"text":"or tie down his tongue with a rope?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “Can you pull in Leviathan with a hook or tie down his tongue with a rope?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you put a cord through his nose","poem":1},{"text":"or pierce his jaw with a hook?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you put a cord through his nose or pierce his jaw with a hook?

contentJson: [{"text":"Will he beg you for mercy","poem":1},{"text":"or speak to you softly?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will he beg you for mercy or speak to you softly?

contentJson: [{"text":"Will he make a covenant with you","poem":1},{"text":"to take him as a slave for life?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will he make a covenant with you to take him as a slave for life?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you pet him like a bird","poem":1},{"text":"or put him on a leash for your maidens?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you pet him like a bird or put him on a leash for your maidens?

contentJson: [{"text":"Will traders barter for him","poem":1},{"text":"or divide him among the merchants?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Will traders barter for him or divide him among the merchants?

contentJson: [{"text":"Can you fill his hide with harpoons","poem":1},{"text":"or his head with fishing spears?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Can you fill his hide with harpoons or his head with fishing spears?

contentJson: [{"text":"If you lay a hand on him,","poem":1},{"text":"you will remember the battle and never repeat it!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If you lay a hand on him, you will remember the battle and never repeat it!

contentJson: [{"text":"Surely hope of overcoming him is false.","poem":1},{"text":"Is not the sight of him overwhelming?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Surely hope of overcoming him is false. Is not the sight of him overwhelming?

contentJson: [{"text":"No one is so fierce as to rouse Leviathan.","poem":1},{"text":"Then who is able to stand against Me?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No one is so fierce as to rouse Leviathan. Then who is able to stand against Me?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who has given to Me that I should repay him?","poem":1},{"noteId":77},{"text":"Everything under heaven is Mine.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who has given to Me that I should repay him? Everything under heaven is Mine.

contentJson: [{"text":"I cannot keep silent about his limbs,","poem":1},{"text":"his power and graceful form.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I cannot keep silent about his limbs, his power and graceful form.

contentJson: [{"text":"Who can strip off his outer coat?","poem":1},{"text":"Who can approach him with a bridle?","poem":2},{"noteId":78}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who can strip off his outer coat? Who can approach him with a bridle?

contentJson: [{"text":"Who can open his jaws,","poem":1},{"text":"ringed by his fearsome teeth?","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Who can open his jaws, ringed by his fearsome teeth?

contentJson: [{"text":"His rows of scales are his pride,","poem":1},{"text":"tightly sealed together.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His rows of scales are his pride, tightly sealed together.

contentJson: [{"text":"One scale is so near to another","poem":1},{"text":"that no air can pass between them.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: One scale is so near to another that no air can pass between them.

contentJson: [{"text":"They are joined to one another;","poem":1},{"text":"they clasp and cannot be separated.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: They are joined to one another; they clasp and cannot be separated.

contentJson: [{"text":"His snorting flashes with light,","poem":1},{"text":"and his eyes are like the rays of dawn.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His snorting flashes with light, and his eyes are like the rays of dawn.

contentJson: [{"text":"Firebrands stream from his mouth;","poem":1},{"text":"fiery sparks shoot forth!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Firebrands stream from his mouth; fiery sparks shoot forth!

contentJson: [{"text":"Smoke billows from his nostrils","poem":1},{"text":"as from a boiling pot over burning reeds.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Smoke billows from his nostrils as from a boiling pot over burning reeds.

contentJson: [{"text":"His breath sets coals ablaze,","poem":1},{"text":"and flames pour from his mouth.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His breath sets coals ablaze, and flames pour from his mouth.

contentJson: [{"text":"Strength resides in his neck,","poem":1},{"text":"and dismay leaps before him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Strength resides in his neck, and dismay leaps before him.

contentJson: [{"text":"The folds of his flesh are tightly joined;","poem":1},{"text":"they are firm and immovable.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The folds of his flesh are tightly joined; they are firm and immovable.

contentJson: [{"text":"His chest is as hard as a rock,","poem":1},{"text":"as hard as a lower millstone!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His chest is as hard as a rock, as hard as a lower millstone!

contentJson: [{"text":"When Leviathan rises up, the mighty are terrified;","poem":1},{"text":"they withdraw before his thrashing.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: When Leviathan rises up, the mighty are terrified; they withdraw before his thrashing.

contentJson: [{"text":"The sword that reaches him has no effect,","poem":1},{"text":"nor does the spear or dart or arrow.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The sword that reaches him has no effect, nor does the spear or dart or arrow.

contentJson: [{"text":"He regards iron as straw","poem":1},{"text":"and bronze as rotten wood.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He regards iron as straw and bronze as rotten wood.

contentJson: [{"text":"No arrow can make him flee;","poem":1},{"text":"slingstones become like chaff to him.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No arrow can make him flee; slingstones become like chaff to him.

contentJson: [{"text":"A club is regarded as straw,","poem":1},{"text":"and he laughs at the sound of the lance.","poem":2},{"noteId":79}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A club is regarded as straw, and he laughs at the sound of the lance.

contentJson: [{"text":"His undersides are jagged potsherds,","poem":1},{"text":"spreading out the mud like a threshing sledge.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: His undersides are jagged potsherds, spreading out the mud like a threshing sledge.

contentJson: [{"text":"He makes the depths seethe like a cauldron;","poem":1},{"text":"he makes the sea like a jar of ointment.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He makes the depths seethe like a cauldron; he makes the sea like a jar of ointment.

contentJson: [{"text":"He leaves a glistening wake behind him;","poem":1},{"text":"one would think the deep had white hair!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He leaves a glistening wake behind him; one would think the deep had white hair!

contentJson: [{"text":"Nothing on earth is his equal—","poem":1},{"text":"a creature devoid of fear!","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Nothing on earth is his equal— a creature devoid of fear!

contentJson: [{"text":"He looks down on all the haughty;","poem":1},{"text":"he is king over all the proud.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He looks down on all the haughty; he is king over all the proud.”

contentJson: ["Then Job replied to the LORD:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Then Job replied to the LORD:

contentJson: [{"text":"“I know that You can do all things","poem":1},{"text":"and that no plan of Yours can be thwarted.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: “I know that You can do all things and that no plan of Yours can be thwarted.

contentJson: [{"text":"You asked, ‘Who is this","poem":1},{"text":"who conceals My counsel without knowledge?’","poem":2},{"noteId":80},{"text":"Surely I spoke of things I did not understand,","poem":1},{"text":"things too wonderful for me to know.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You asked, ‘Who is this who conceals My counsel without knowledge?’ Surely I spoke of things I did not understand, things too wonderful for me to know.

contentJson: [{"text":"You said, ‘Listen now, and I will speak.","poem":1},{"text":"I will question you, and you shall inform Me.’","poem":2},{"noteId":81}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: You said, ‘Listen now, and I will speak. I will question you, and you shall inform Me.’

contentJson: [{"text":"My ears had heard of You,","poem":1},{"text":"but now my eyes have seen You.","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: My ears had heard of You, but now my eyes have seen You.

contentJson: [{"text":"Therefore I retract my words,","poem":1},{"text":"and I repent in dust and ashes.”","poem":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Therefore I retract my words, and I repent in dust and ashes.”

contentJson: ["After the LORD had spoken these words to Job, He said to Eliphaz the Temanite, “My wrath is kindled against you and your two friends. For you have not spoken about Me accurately, as My servant Job has."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: After the LORD had spoken these words to Job, He said to Eliphaz the Temanite, “My wrath is kindled against you and your two friends. For you have not spoken about Me accurately, as My servant Job has.

contentJson: ["So now, take seven bulls and seven rams, go to My servant Job, and sacrifice a burnt offering for yourselves. Then My servant Job will pray for you, for I will accept his prayer and not deal with you according to your folly. For you have not spoken accurately about Me, as My servant Job has.”"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So now, take seven bulls and seven rams, go to My servant Job, and sacrifice a burnt offering for yourselves. Then My servant Job will pray for you, for I will accept his prayer and not deal with you according to your folly. For you have not spoken accurately about Me, as My servant Job has.”

contentJson: ["So Eliphaz the Temanite, Bildad the Shuhite, and Zophar the Naamathite went and did as the LORD had told them; and the LORD accepted Job’s request."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So Eliphaz the Temanite, Bildad the Shuhite, and Zophar the Naamathite went and did as the LORD had told them; and the LORD accepted Job’s request.

contentJson: ["After Job had prayed for his friends, the LORD restored his prosperity and doubled his former possessions."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: After Job had prayed for his friends, the LORD restored his prosperity and doubled his former possessions.

contentJson: ["All his brothers and sisters and prior acquaintances came and dined with him in his house. They consoled him and comforted him over all the adversity that the LORD had brought upon him. And each one gave him a piece of silver",{"noteId":82},"and a gold ring."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: All his brothers and sisters and prior acquaintances came and dined with him in his house. They consoled him and comforted him over all the adversity that the LORD had brought upon him. And each one gave him a piece of silver and a gold ring.

contentJson: ["So the LORD blessed Job’s latter days more than his first. He owned 14,000 sheep, 6,000 camels, 1,000 yoke of oxen, and 1,000 female donkeys."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: So the LORD blessed Job’s latter days more than his first. He owned 14,000 sheep, 6,000 camels, 1,000 yoke of oxen, and 1,000 female donkeys.

contentJson: ["And he also had seven sons and three daughters."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And he also had seven sons and three daughters.

contentJson: ["He named his first daughter Jemimah, his second Keziah, and his third Keren-happuch."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: He named his first daughter Jemimah, his second Keziah, and his third Keren-happuch.

contentJson: ["No women as beautiful as Job’s daughters could be found in all the land, and their father granted them an inheritance among their brothers."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: No women as beautiful as Job’s daughters could be found in all the land, and their father granted them an inheritance among their brothers.

contentJson: ["After this, Job lived 140 years and saw his children and their children to the fourth generation."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: After this, Job lived 140 years and saw his children and their children to the fourth generation.

contentJson: ["And so Job died, old and full of years."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And so Job died, old and full of years.
